todos.title: Clarify verification goal
todos.description: Ask the user what they mean by 'verify this workflow' and whether they want an actual MCP call and any credentials or tokens required.

todos.title: Locate Better Auth MCP references
todos.description: Search repository for references to Better Auth, the MCP URL, env vars, or integration points (routes, auth client, config).

todos.title: Attempt MCP connection (if allowed)
todos.description: If the user approves and provides any necessary credentials, attempt to query the Better Auth MCP endpoint and validate the workflow responses.

todos.title: Verify local workflow steps
todos.description: Check code paths (frontend auth client, backend auth handlers/middleware) to ensure they follow expected Better Auth flow; list mismatches or missing pieces.

todos.title: Report and remediation
todos.description: Summarize findings, tests performed, and propose fixes or next steps (including adding tests or CI checks).

todos.title: Implement session policy changes
todos.description: Set short-lived access tokens, refresh token lifetime, idle timeout and warning; add client helpers and UI.

todos.title: Add client session helper and warning UI
todos.description: Create `session.ts` and `session-warning.tsx` and document integration points.

todos.title: Wire timers in app
todos.description: Integrate the session timers with the running app - schedule timers after login and on refresh.
